venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Some of you may be aware, Star Trek: The Next Generation is being released on Bluray. To celebrate, they teamed up with Fathom Events to screen certain episodes in theaters. For the season 3 release, they are screening "Best of Both Worlds" parts 1 & 2, along with some of the bonus features!

http://www.fathomevents.com/#!star-trek-best-of-both-worlds/more-info/details

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation
